Vanilla Milkshake

Ingredients

  • 1/3 cup water
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 4 pks Equal
  • 1/2 tsp vanilla
  • 3 ice cubes

Instructions

  1. Put all ingredients in blender
  2. Blend on high until ice is completely blended (~3 mins)
